title: SmartLash Eyelash Enhancer 0.16 oz.
description: This physician-tested, non-irritating lash enhancement gem completely transforms the appearance of your lashes. If you desire a lash line that looks thick, long and full, SmartLash is the formula for you. The prostaglandin-free blend frees you from the harsh side effects of other lash enhancement products, and is ophthalmologist-approved for wearers of contact lenses and sensitive eyes. Results may be seen in as little as seven days! Also beneficial for brow enhancement.      In clinical studies, participants experienced:  Up to a 68% increase in the appearance of lash length!*  100% saw an increase in the appearance of eyelash length, fullness and thickness after 30 days.  100% indicated a superior performance of this product when compared to previously used eyelash enhancement products.  100% said they feel like they need less mascara.  100% would recommend SMARTLASH to a friend.   *Results based on a 60-day independent clinical study with product application twice a day.

title: Nutra Luxe Lash MD Beauty Eyelash Conditioner 1.50ml,  Box
description: Physician Formulated - Ophthalogish Safety Tested NUTRALUXE LASH MD is a breakthrough technology that was the first eyelash conditioner on the market in 2007, to use a new and safe cosmetic derivative ingredient. If you want spectacular long lashes or full eyebrows naturally, NUTRALUXE LASH MD is the right product for you. This safe and new formula will help to improve your eyelashes and eyebrows in lenght, fullness, thickness, and darkness in only 4 to 8 weeks. Physician Formulated, Ophthalmologist safety tested, Alcohol Free, Fragrance Free Helps your lashes reach their full potential in length, fullness, thickness and darkness Can also be used on eyelashes to fill in those blank spots Natural antioxidant help to protect hair and follicles from environmental damage Promotes hydration and helps lashes and brows to appear shiny and strong Promotes healthy follicles, softens brittle lashes and brows & improves elasticity Helps lashes and brows to stay longer by making lashes more flexible Repairs fragile hair damage caused by harsh eyeliner or mascara cosmetics Gives your lashes and brows shine and a healthy looking glow Helps to reinforce and strengthen the lashes and brows

title: Jennifer Aniston for Women Eau De Parfum Spray, 2.9 Ounce
description: Evoking memories of sunny days at the beach and happy summer nights, this captivating composition includes light, blooming floral notes set against a sensual base of musk and woods.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Tree Hut Olive and Shea Sugar Body Scrub, Lavender and Chamomile, 18-Ounce
description: Delight your senses as you smooth your skin with this rich, exfoliating olive and shea sugar body scrub. The whole sugar grains provide a gentle yet deep exfoliation, the olive oil and shea help preserve your skin's natural moisture and the vitamin c keeps your skin looking healthy. Certified organic shea butter, natural moisturizer, hydrates dry skin and promotes skin elasticity. Certified organic olive oil, rich in nutrients, antioxidants and vitamins. Includes anti-inflammatory, moisturizing and regenerating properties.
